mapper.insert: INSERT INTO suggest (user_id, title, content) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content})
INSERT INTO suggest_reply (suggest_id, user_id, content) VALUES (#{suggestId}, #{userId}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE suggest_reply SET suggest_reply.content = #{content} WHERE suggest_reply.reply_id = #{replyId};
UPDATE suggest SET suggest.state = 1 WHERE suggest_id = #{suggestId}
mapper.select: SELECT s.suggest_id , s.user_id , s.title , s.content , DATE_FORMAT(s.created_at, "%Y-%m-%d") AS created_at , s.state , u.nickname FROM suggest s LEFT JOIN user u ON s.user_id = u.user_id WHERE s.suggest_id = #{suggestID}

SELECT s.reply_id , s.suggest_id , s.user_id , s.content , DATE_FORMAT(s.created_at, "%Y-%m-%d") AS created_at , u.nickname FROM suggest_reply s LEFT JOIN user u ON s.user_id = u.user_id WHERE suggest_id=#{suggestId} ORDER BY s.created_at DESC LIMIT #{criteria.offset}, #{criteria.countPerPage}
SELECT count(suggest_id) FROM suggest_reply WHERE suggest_id = #{suggestId}

SELECT count(suggest_id) FROM suggest
WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
WHERE content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
WHERE nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
WHERE content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

SELECT s.suggest_id , s.user_id , s.title , s.content , DATE_FORMAT(s.created_at, "%Y-%m-%d") AS created_at , s.state , u.nickname FROM suggest s LEFT JOIN user u ON s.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY s.created_at desc LIMIT #{offset}, #{countPerPage}

SELECT s.suggest_id , s.user_id , s.title , s.content , DATE_FORMAT(s.created_at, '%y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS created_at , s.state , u.nickname ,count(sr.suggest_id )AS count
FROM suggest s LEFT JOIN user u ON s.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN suggest_reply sr ON s.suggest_id = sr.suggest_id
WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
WHERE content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
WHERE nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
WHERE content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') AND title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
WHERE state LIKE 0 OR 1
WHERE state LIKE 0
WHERE state LIKE 1
GROUP BY s.suggest_id, s.user_id, s.title, s.content, s.created_at, u.nickname, s.state
ORDER BY created_at DESC
LIMIT #{offset},#{countPerPage}
SELECT state FROM suggest WHERE suggest_id = #{suggestId}
